name: Meta Sandbox
description:
- CONSTRUCTION SITE, WORK IN PROGRESS -

Controls:

Arrow keys - movement
X (Hold) - Physics shield
LShift (Hold) - Flight
Drag and drop .msbx files to add objects into the game!
Hold Left Click to position objects.
Middle Click an object to remove it.

Partially inspired by "Your Moon" in LBP for PSP.


The game may look differently on stream.
